headline: Linde Appoints Sanjiv Lamba as Chairman & CEO
summary: WOKING, England, September 29, 2025--Linde (Nasdaq: LIN) today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Sanjiv Lamba, currently serving as Chief Executive Officer, to the additional role of Chairman of the Board, effective January 31, 2026.
